title: 2018–19 Oman Professional League
text:
The 2018–19 Oman Professional League is the 43rd edition of the <a href="Oman%20Professional%20League">Oman Professional League</a>, the top <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league in <a href="Oman">Oman</a>. The season started on August 17, 2018.
Foreign players.
Restricting the number of foreign players strictly to four per team, including a slot for a player from <a href="Asian%20Football%20Confederation">AFC</a> countries. A team could use four foreign players on the field during each game including at least one player from the AFC country.
League table.
